mapper.select: SELECT comSectionCode ,comSectionName FROM cfcomsection WHERE comCode=#{comCode}
SELECT comau.memberEmail ,mem.memberName FROM cfcomauthority AS comau INNER JOIN cfmemberemail AS mem ON comau.memberEmail=mem.memberEmail WHERE comau.comCode=#{comCode} AND comSectionCode IS NULL

SELECT comau.memberEmail ,mem.memberName FROM cfcomauthority AS comau INNER JOIN cfmemberemail AS mem ON comau.memberEmail=mem.memberEmail WHERE comau.comCode=#{comCode} AND comPositionCode IS NULL AND comSectionCode IS NOT NULL
mapper.update: UPDATE cfmemberemail SET comCode=#{comCode} ,memberClassificationCode=2 WHERE memberEmail=#{memberEmail};
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT mem.memberEmail ,mem.memberName ,coma.comAuthorityApproval ,coma.comCode FROM cfcomauthority AS coma LEFT JOIN cfmemberemail AS mem ON mem.memberEmail=coma.memberEmail WHERE coma.comCode=#{comCode} AND coma.comAuthorityApproval=0;

SELECT customerCode ,comCode ,customerNumber ,customerCeo ,customerName ,customerAddress ,customerPhone ,customerCreditNumber ,customerContactNumber ,customerCategory ,customerRemarks FROM cfcustomer WHERE comCode=#{comCode};
SELECT comAuthorityApproval FROM cfcomauthority WHERE memberEmail=#{memberEmail} AND comCode=#{comCode}

SELECT comCode ,comName ,comRegistrationNumber ,comWebPage ,comCeoName ,comInfo ,comLogoName ,comLogoOriginalName ,comIntroduction ,comPhone ,memberEmail ,comRegistrationRequestDay ,managerApproval ,managerApprovalDay ,managerApprovalEmail ,comIndustry ,comCondition FROM cfcombaseinfo WHERE comCode=#{comCode};
SELECT comCode , comName , comCeoName , comRegistrationNumber , comInfo , comAddress , comPhone , comIndustry FROM cfcombaseinfo WHERE managerApproval = 1 ORDER BY comName ASC

SELECT comCode , comName , comRegistrationNumber , comWebPage , comCeoName , comInfo , comIntroduction , comAddress , comPhone , memberEmail , comRegistrationRequestDay , managerApproval , managerApprovalDay , managerApprovalEmail , comIndustry ,comCondition FROM cfcombaseinfo WHERE managerApproval = 0 ORDER BY comName ASC
